:: Wolfgang ::

:: Raises his head towards Zardus. Wolfgang snarls. ::

I don't take orders from you. 
        Troops! We attack the Maximals now! And, since we're allied with 
Hellbeast, we shall destroy Megatrons men as well.

:: Looks to Zardus. ::

We'll be back. We're going to make some action! Not just upgrade the defenses 
and hide. The times have changed and I am incharge.

:: Starts to walk to the maximal base with Reptilica and crew behind. ::
